title: Cyber Jobs Website
description: Developed as a final project for the Web Programming course. This web-based job portal allows job seekers to find job listings and companies to post job openings.
keyFeatures: User registration and authentication for job seekers and companies
Job posting and application functionality
Search and filter capabilities for job listings
Responsive design for mobile and desktop users
Admin dashboard for website management

title: Wedding Organizer App
description: A desktop application for managing wedding organizer bookings. It features three roles: Admin, Wedding Organizer, and User.
keyFeatures: User role-based access control
Booking management system
Wedding package customization
Client management dashboard
Financial reporting and analytics

title: Children's Book Design
description: Designed and illustrated three children's books for Tim Himpaudi Kabupaten Ciamis, targeting children aged 4-7 years.
keyFeatures: Created three visually engaging book covers
Designed and structured 25+ pages of content
Illustrated characters and scenes using vector graphics
Developed age-appropriate visuals for educational content
Collaborated with educators to align visuals with learning objectives

title: Heart Disease Prediction
description: Analyzed health-related datasets to predict heart disease using machine learning algorithms.
keyFeatures: Data cleaning and preprocessing of medical datasets
Exploratory data analysis with visualization
Feature engineering and selection
Implementation of multiple machine learning models
Model performance comparison and optimization
